author: LNPR
title: Perfect location, soundproof, delicious meals
text:
The first time I stayed in this hotel was 40 years ago and it was my home for two weeks. After, I made some more stays. This time I wanted to see, how this hotel is doing now, and the location was perfect for my needs.
The soundproofing is now much better,I stayed in a second floor room overlooking the Opéra building, but the traffic or neighbors didn’t disturb me. I slept better than home.
The rooms are still different sizes. I had a classic room, which may seem small to someone, but the bed was big and the bathroom was spacious. However, you can have a bigger room or even a suite, if needed. It was still possible to have the breakfast served in the room, but you could also have it in the restaurant.
Half of the lobby was transformed to restaurant (The Bar), and I enjoyed my lunch there every day, under the glass roof. The food and service were very good.
In case you are a member of IHG, you have free WiFi for more than 3 days, and a newspaper delivered to your room every morning.
There was an iron and a board, a kettle, some instant coffee and tea bags and two spoons. There was also a fridge, and when I opened the door after I arrived, there was immediately a person wanting to check it, and therefore I left the fridge in peace. I had good reading lights both sides of the bed and a floor lamp next to the table. There were no small lights in the room during the night, but I had a small flashlight with me.
